title: ManYx eSports NEW ORGANISATION Looking For Any Skill Level Players For Ranked Teams!
body:
**Welcome and Thank You for reading!**
**ManYx eSports** is an_ unpaid, non-sponsored_ organisation run by myself and a few friends. We are new, and wish to help players to become part of a ranked team and hopefully make some friends! Whether you're still quite new to the game, knowledgeable enough, or even a pro! Please feel free to check out our discord and head to the Sign-Up Forms to become apart of our awesome new Organisation and a fully functioning Ranked Team!
My summoner name is "**TitMit**", Founder and Owner of ManYx eSports. Please add me where i will then send you the discord link, **I accept all requests**! Just tell me you saw the **Forum Post** :)

(THIS ORGANISATION IS ONLY FOR OCEANIC PLAYERS ONLY, for now:3)

THANK YOU FOR READING {{champion:202}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
